EmailTemplate.name: 201905_BK_Event_Oshkosh_mih.201905_BK_Event_Invite1_Oshkosh_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us in Oshkosh for EAA’s AirVenture Event | July 23, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> 2019 ANNUAL CUSTOMER APPRECIATION EVENT YOU ARE INVITED! Dear Customers,
It’s going to be an exciting AirVenture in Oshkosh this year at the BendixKing Pavilion. From new products and services to complete integrated flight decks, we’ll have on display everything you’ll need to upgrade your experimental and certified aircraft.
Register for our Annual Customer Appreciation Event on July 23 at our Pavilion #292, where you can enjoy food and beverages with our team members and celebrate our 60th Anniversary, while learning about our experimental and certified aircraft solutions. Register today, as our popular event is space-limited.
REGISTER HERE FOR AN EVENT TICKET <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_BK_Oshkosh.html]]>
For your database purchase needs we ask that you email DSA@honeywell.com <[[mailto:DSA@honeywell.com]]> or call 855-250-7027 option 1. You can also visit our website at wingmanservices.bendixking.com <[[wingmanservices.bendixking.com]]>. We will have a product support team onsite to answer questions on your legacy BendixKing equipment.
We look forward to seeing you at Oshkosh!
